name: AirCoin
description: The Air Coin(AIR) project was issued to mock the madness of the cryptocurrency market. After buying Air Coin, you get nothing but AIR. It was issued on Binance Smart Chain. No private placement, no crowdfunding, complete community autonomy. Token Info Name: AIR Symbol: AIR Decimal: 18 Total Supply: 10000000000000000 (16 zeros) Contract Address: 0xd8a2ae43fd061d24acd538e3866ffc2c05151b53 Initial Liquidity All the initial AIR-BNB LP tokens have been destroyed by sending to 0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000001. It means that all the initial liquidity was locked forever.
